com.continuuity.loom.http
Class LoomAdminHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.continuuity.http.AbstractHttpHandler
      com.continuuity.loom.http.LoomAuthHandler
          com.continuuity.loom.http.LoomAdminHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.continuuity.http.HttpHandler
public class LoomAdminHandler
extends LoomAuthHandler

Handler for getting, adding, modifying, and deleting admin defined Loom entities. GET calls work for any user, non-GET calls work only for admin.

Field Summary

                           com.continuuity.http.HttpResponder responder,
                           String providerId)
                    throws Exception

responder - Responder for sending the response.

putProvider

public void putProvider(org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest request,
                        com.continuuity.http.HttpResponder responder,
                        String providerId)
                 throws Exception
Writes a Provider. User must be admin or a 403 is returned. If the name in the path does not match the name in the put body, a 400 is returned.

Parameters:
request - Request to write provider.
responder - Responder to send response.
providerId - Id of the provider to write.
Throws:
Exception

                  throws Exception

exportConfig

public void exportConfig(org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest request,
                         com.continuuity.http.HttpResponder responder)
                  throws Exception
Export all providers, hardware types, image types, services, and cluster templates.

Parameters:
request - Request to export admin definable entities.
responder - Responder for sending response.
Throws:
Exception

importConfig

public void importConfig(org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest request,
                         com.continuuity.http.HttpResponder responder)
                  throws Exception
Imports all providers, image types, hardware types, services, and cluster templates from a file. All existing providers, image types, hardware types, services, and cluster templates will be deleted.

Parameters:
request - Request to import admin definable entities.
responder - Responder for sending response.
Throws:
Exception
